history.content:
Want to be a mentor for Cal Hacks' new DeCal? Now’s your chance!

You can join the mentor team for our Cubstart DeCal, where you can pass down your knowledge on iOS or Web development, project tips/tricks, and other technical skills to help support our students during virtual learning. It is also a chance to share your experiences with beginner hackers!

Apply here 🐻🤩: links.calhacks.io/cubstart_mentor

Throughout the course, you will be speaking with the students directly to solidify the material they are learning about, either through email or through office hours (which they can set up individually). As mentors, the time commitment is up to you, but we ask that you at least dedicate 1 hour around every 1-2 weeks to host OH and be responsive over email with our students.If you know someone or have a friend who would potentially make an awesome mentor, we’d love for you to share this opportunity with them!
history.subject: Mentor Opportunity - Cubstart: Learn to Build DeCal
